com.carlos - package com.carlos
 
computeAnyFizzBuzzNumbers() - Method in class com.carlos.FizzBuzzTest
Verifies compute() behavior for composite cases where both "Fizz" and "Buzz" might appear according to the kata's specific rules.
computeBuzzNumbers() - Method in class com.carlos.FizzBuzzTest
Verifies compute() returns "Buzz" for numbers that contain 5 or are divisible by 5 but are not divisible by 3 or contain 3 (according to the kata rules implemented).
computeFizzNumbers() - Method in class com.carlos.FizzBuzzTest
Verifies compute() returns "Fizz" for numbers that contain 3 or are divisible by 3 but are not divisible by 5 or contain 5 (according to the kata rules implemented).
computeNormalNumbers() - Method in class com.carlos.FizzBuzzTest
Verifies the compute() method returns the number as a string for inputs that are not positive or zero.
computeThrowsOnInvalidNumber() - Method in class com.carlos.FizzBuzzTest
Verifies compute() returns IllegalArgumentException for invalid inputs.
constructorThrowsOnInvalidLimit() - Method in class com.carlos.FizzBuzzTest
Verifies the constructor throws an exception for invalid limits.

P

playFizzBuzzUpToLimitToList() - Method in class com.carlos.FizzBuzzTest
Verifies playToList() returns the full FizzBuzz sequence up to the configured limit and that its elements match the expected sequence computed by calling FizzBuzz.compute(int) repeatedly.
playFizzBuzzUpToLimitToText() - Method in class com.carlos.FizzBuzzTest
Verifies playToText() returns a newline-separated representation of the full FizzBuzz sequence equivalent to joining the list returned by playFizzBuzzUpToLimitToList().
